title: AFK Warning
body: I just finished playing a game in which I had 2500 ping for the majority of the game (I'm not complaining about ping because I know this was an Optus related problem, not a LoL one). I could not foresee this problem happening, and I apologised to my teammates and tried playing to the best of my ability. As I could barely move all game, I decided to play safe and sit under the turret for most of the game. I did not AFK and I ended 2/1 and I was the same level as someone on the other team. When the game finished I got a warning for supposedly being AFK. I've been playing LoL for something like 4 years now and I've never once received so much as a warning before. I'm just wondering if this was some sort of error that needs to be looked into or do people legitimately get punished for this now?
